archiefmat.titel: Office of the Commander in Chief: Monthly returns to the Adjutant General
archiefmat.titel_eng: Office of the Commander in Chief: Monthly returns to the Adjutant General
archiefmat.scope: This series comprises returns to the Adjutant General showing the distribution of each regiment at home and abroad, and its effective strength in all ranks, with the names of all commissioned officers present and absent. They give general particulars as to the health of the regiment, the dates of death of officers dying within the month and the numbers of men discharged for any cause.
